headline: How Royal Caribbean's 2036 Shipbuilding Deal May Shape the Growth Path for RCL Investors
summary: Earlier this week, Royal Caribbean Group announced a long-term framework agreement with Meyer Turku shipyard, securing shipbuilding capacity through 2036, with a confirmed order for its fifth Icon Class ship for 2028 and options for additional vessels. This agreement not only solidifies Royal Caribbean’s access to advanced shipbuilding but also underscores its ambitions to introduce new ship classes and maintain innovation leadership in the cruise sector. We'll examine how Royal Caribbean's...

headline: Cruise Stocks Took a Hit in 2020. Five Years Later, Is It Time for Investors to Reconsider?
summary: It certainly has been an interesting few years for the cruise industry.
